column2: Activision and any related parties Bring Geometry Wars 2 retro Evolved to the STEAM / PC Platform!
column5: I am a huge fan of Geometry Wars 2 - Retro Evolved,,,Please Bring Geometry Wars 2 to the STEAM / PC Platform! You have a huge untapped market on the PC/STEAM system that would love to give you $$$ for a quality port of this game into the PC world...we are eager to pay you to bring this great game to life! Please consider this petition and make it happen! Thank you so much in advance! "
